DataElement.preferredName: Electrocardiogram Assessment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a patient to participate in a clinical study relating to the final result and interpretation of electrical manifestations of heart activity as outlined in the study protocol.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is baseline ECG normal, or wi
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is baseline ECG normal, or with stable changes if patient has chronic ECG changes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had an electrocardiogram (ECG) within 8 weeks prior to treatment assignment and has no clinically important abnormalities in rhythm, conduction or morphology of resting ECG?
